chat.placeholder: Describe your diagram or upload a file...
chat.minimalTooltip: Use minimal for faster generation (no colors)
chat.failedToCopyDetail: Failed to copy message. Please copy manually or check clipboard permissions.

examples.title: Create diagrams with AI
examples.subtitle: Describe what you want to create or upload an image to replicate
examples.animatedDescription: Draw a transformer architecture with animated connectors
examples.awsDescription: Create a cloud architecture diagram with AWS icons
examples.replicateDescription: Upload and replicate an existing flowchart
examples.cachedNote: Examples are cached for instant response
examples.mcpDescription: Use in Claude Desktop, VS Code & Cursor

settings.title: Settings
settings.aiProviderDescription: Use your own API key to bypass usage limits. Your key is stored locally in your browser and is never stored on the server.
settings.themeDescription: Dark/Light mode for interface and DrawIO canvas.
settings.diagramStyleDescription: Toggle between minimal and styled diagram output.
settings.proxyDescription: Configure HTTP/HTTPS proxy for API requests (Desktop only)
settings.diagramValidationDescription: Use a vision language model to validate generated diagrams. Requires a VLM like GPT-5.2 or Sonnet-4.5.

save.title: Save Diagram
save.description: Choose a format and filename to save your diagram.

history.title: Diagram History
history.description:
Here saved each diagram before AI modification.
Click on a diagram to restore it
history.noHistory: No history available yet. Send messages to create diagram history.

dialogs.clearDescription: This will clear the current conversation and reset the diagram. This action cannot be undone.

errors.unsupportedType: "{name}" is not a supported file type
errors.invalidAccessCode: Invalid or missing access code. Please configure it in Settings.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.retryLimit: Auto-retry limit reached ({max}). Please try again manually.
errors.continuationRetryLimit: Continuation retry limit reached ({max}). The diagram may be too complex.
errors.validationFailed: Diagram validation failed. Please try regenerating.
errors.malformedXml: AI generated invalid diagram XML. Please try regenerating.
errors.failedToProcess: Failed to process diagram. Please try regenerating.
errors.sessionCorrupted: Session data was corrupted. Starting fresh.
errors.failedToSave: Failed to save messages to localStorage
errors.failedToPersist: Failed to persist state before unload
errors.failedToRecordFeedback: Failed to record your feedback. Please try again.
errors.storageUpdateFailed: Chat cleared but browser storage could not be updated

quota.tpmMessage: Too many requests. Please wait a moment.
quota.tpmMessageDetailed: Rate limit reached ({limit} tokens/min). Please wait {seconds} seconds before sending another request.
quota.messageApi: Looks like you've reached today's demo limit. We're thrilled you're enjoying it, and while ByteDance Doubao generously sponsors this demo, we've had to set a few boundaries to keep things fair for everyone.
quota.messageToken: Looks like you've reached today's token limit. We're thrilled you're enjoying it, and while ByteDance Doubao generously sponsors this demo, we've had to set a few boundaries to keep things fair for everyone.
quota.tip: Tip: You can use your own API key (click the Settings icon) or self-host the project to bypass these limits.
quota.reset: Your limit resets tomorrow. Thanks for understanding.
quota.doubaoSponsorship: Register here to get 500K free tokens per model (including Doubao, DeepSeek and Kimi), then configure your API key in model settings.

url.title: Extract Content from URL
url.description: Paste a URL to extract and analyze its content

dev.title: Dev: XML Streaming Simulator
dev.placeholder: Paste mxCell XML here or select a preset...

about.usageNotice: Due to high usage, I have changed the model from Claude to minimax-m2 and added some usage limits. See About page for details.

sessionHistory.deleteDescription: This will permanently delete this chat session and its diagram. This action cannot be undone.

validation.title: Validate Diagram
validation.passedValidation: Diagram passed visual validation - no issues detected.
validation.improvementRequested: Improvement requested - check the new diagram below
validation.regenerateWithFeedback: Regenerate the diagram using the validation feedback

modelConfig.title: AI Model Configuration
modelConfig.description: Configure multiple AI providers and models
modelConfig.noModels: No models configured. Add a model to get started.
modelConfig.selectProvider: Select a provider or add a new one
modelConfig.configureMultiple: Configure multiple AI providers and switch between them easily
modelConfig.apiKeyStored: API keys are stored locally in your browser
modelConfig.addModelFirst: Add at least one model to validate
modelConfig.addProviderHint: Add a provider to get started
modelConfig.selectProviderHint: Select a provider from the list or add a new one to configure API keys and models
modelConfig.deleteConfirmDesc: Are you sure you want to delete {name}? This will remove all configured models and cannot be undone.
modelConfig.noVerifiedModels: No verified models. Test your models first.
modelConfig.unvalidatedModelWarning: This model has not been validated
